鵾字的基本解释

鵾
kūn
见“鹍”。

鵾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kūn］
［《廣韻》古渾切，平魂，見。］
“鹍1”的繁体字。
(1)鵾鸡。古代指像鹤的一种鸟。
(2)《鵾鸡曲》的省称。
(3)用同“鯤”。大鱼。参见“鵾鵬”。

鵾字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鵾； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1493第06
【廣韻】古渾切【集韻】【韻會】公渾切，?音昆。【玉篇】似雞而大也。【廣韻】鵾雞。【楚辭·九辯】鵾雞啁哳而悲鳴。又作鶤。【韻會】陽溝巨鶤，古之雞名。亦作昆。【前漢·司馬相如傳】亂昆雞。【註】昆同鵾。又叶俱倫切，音君。【傅毅·洛都賦】屬蒲且以矰繳，命詹何使沈綸。維高冥之獨鵠，連軒翥之雙鵾。

考證：〔【楚辭·九辯】鵾雞啁唽而悲鳴。〕　謹照原文啁唽改啁哳。

Luan
Basic explanation of words
Luan
kūn
See "Kun".
Luan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kūn］
["Guangyun" Gu Hun cut, Ping Hun, see. ]
Traditional characters for "鹍1".
(1) Luan chicken. In ancient times, it refers to a bird that resembles a crane.
(2) The provincial title of "Lianjiqu".
(3) Use the same "kun". Big fish. See "Lu Peng".
Luan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鵾; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1493 Page 06
[Guang Yun] Ancient Hun cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Gong Hun cut,? Yin Kun. [Jade articles] It is as big as a chicken. [Guang Yun] Chicken. [Songs of the Chu·Nine Debates] The chicken chirps and screams mournfully. Also made a kun. [Rhyme Club] Yanggou Giant Kun, the name of the ancient rooster. Also known as Kun. [Previous Han·Sima Xiangru Biography] Chaos Kunji. [Note] Kun Tongluan. And Ye Julun cut, Yinjun. [Fu Yi·Luodu Fu] Belonging to Pu Qiyi pay, order Zhan He to Shen Lun. Wei Gaoming's single 鹄, Lian Xuanzhu's double 鵾. Textual research: [[Chu Ci·Nine Debate] The chicken screamed and wailed. 〕　I would like to change the chuckling according to the original text.
